BOSS is Bharat Operating System Solutions. An Indian GNU/Linux distribution customized for Indian environment
Software that coordinates between the hardware and other parts of the computer to run other software is called an operating system, or the OS.

patterns: What are the variants of BOSS?
responses: BOSS is available as Desktop version, server edition and educational versions.

patterns: What is the difference between desktop and educational versions?
responses: BOSS is available as Desktop version, server edition and educational versions.
An educational variant of BOSS GNU/Linux focusing Indian schools.

patterns: Is BOSS a debian based linux?
what type of linux is boss?
responses: BOSS is a debian based linux.

patterns: Is BOSS a redhat based linux?
what type of linux is boss?
responses: BOSS is a debian based linux.
No.  Both are two different operating systems.

patterns: Does Microsoft Office run in BOSS Linux?
responses: No.  But, there are many FOSS equivalent for Microsoft Office suite like LibreOffice, Abi Word etc., are available in BOSS linux.

patterns: What are the minimum requirements for installing BOSS?
responses: To install BOSS , you need to have a minimum of 10.0 GB of hard disk space, 512 MB of RAM and a DVD­ ROM drive.

patterns: Is there any email id for sending BOSS queries?
responses: Yes. Send your queries to bosslinux@cdac.in
Send your doubts/queries to bosslinux@cdac.in

patterns: What is the difference between BOSS and EduBOSS?
responses: BOSS is for generic desktop users and EduBOSS is designed and developed for Schools.
Refer http://downloads.bosslinux.in/usermanual/BOSS_Anoop_Updated_Installation_Manual.pdf

patterns: What is the difference between windows and BOSS?
responses: Windows is a closed-source operating system and BOSS is an open source linux based operating system.

patterns: How to find the version of BOSS installed in my PC?
responses: Check Applications -> System Tools -> Settings -> Details -> Overview or run the following command in terminal, “lsb_release -a”.

patterns: how many language boss os support?
responses: BOSS support almost all indian language
